scripts.build:wasm: if command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1; then cd ../rust/lumen-wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../docs/public/wasm; elif [ -n "$CI" ]; then echo "wasm-pack is required in CI to build docs" >&2; exit 1; else echo "wasm-pack not found; skipping local WASM build for docs"; fi
